name: @rgrove/parse-xml
description: A fast, safe, compliant XML parser for Node.js and browsers.
author: Ryan Grove <ryan@wonko.com>

scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:bundle && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:docs: documentation readme --quiet --access public --config documentation.yml --markdown-toc false --parse-extension ts --readme-file API.md --section '@rgrove/parse-xml API Documentation' src
scripts.coverage: nyc --reporter html --report-dir coverage npm test && open coverage/index.html
scripts.lint: npm run lint:js && npm run lint:ts
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test:watch: npm run build:js && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names build,mocha 'npm run build:js -- --watch' 'mocha --watch'
scripts.test:browser: npm run build:js && concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --names build,webpack 'npm run build:js -- --watch' 'webpack serve --config tests/webpack.config.js'
